c74object.name: weaver~
c74object.digest: Writes incoming track data into a polybuffer~
c74object.description: The `weaver~` object "weaves" audio from external palette buffers into a named `polybuffer~`. It monitors an incoming time ramp signal on its inlet. When the ramp crosses an integer (with a 9ms lookahead), it looks up the corresponding bar in an external transcript dictionary. Each bar entry in the dictionary (organized by track and timestamp) defines a `palette` (the name of an external buffer~) and an `offset`. The object then blends a continuous segment of audio from that palette buffer into the member of the `polybuffer~` corresponding to the track, using sample-accurate crossfading for smooth transitions.

inlet.description: Accepts an audio signal treated as a time ramp in milliseconds. Integer crossings and ramp wrap-arounds trigger dictionary lookups to weave audio.

outlet.description: Outputs the current position of the 9ms lookahead scan head in milliseconds.
Outputs diagnostic information when the log attribute is enabled.

objarg.name: dictionary
objarg.digest: Name of the dictionary to reference

objarg.name: polybuffer
objarg.digest: Name of the polybuffer~ to reference

method.name: anything
method.digest: Change transcript dictionary or set maximum tracks
method.description: Accepts a symbol to change the name of the transcript dictionary being referenced. Also accepts the message `tracks` followed by an integer to set the maximum number of tracks to process.

attribute.name: tracks
attribute.description: The maximum number of tracks to process from the transcript dictionary (default is 4).

attribute.name: low
attribute.description: Minimum ramp time for crossfades in milliseconds.

attribute.name: high
attribute.description: Maximum ramp time for crossfades in milliseconds.
